title: Documentation Templates and Rules
introduction: The Documentation Templates and Rules (DTR) Implementation Guide (IG) specifies how payer rules can be executed in a provider context to ensure that documentation requirements are met. The IG is a companion to the Coverage Requirements Discovery (CRD) IG, which uses CDS Hooks to query payers to determine if there are documentation requirements for a proposed medication, procedure or other service.
author: MITRE Dev Team

list.desc: Continuous Integration Build for FHIR R4 (latest in version control)
For Comment Ballot for FHIR R4
